item.title: The Crust
item.description:
Title: The Crust
Genre: Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: VEOM Studio
Publisher: Crytivo
Franchise: The Crust
Release Date: Jul 15, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jul 15, 2024




About This Game

Mine resources and automate their production processes

Mine lunar resources, craft processing machinery, and power up your base with satellites and batteries. Unlock scientific advancements across three research trees to enhance your technological capabilities.

Automate resources with conveyor belts and drones.

Streamline your resource management as you deploy conveyor belts and drones for seamless automation

Explore

Embark on lunar expeditions to unearth the moon's hidden secrets, deploying your rover to various locations and delving into the mysteries of humanity's newfound lunar habitat.

Trade Resources

Engage in resource exchange with Earth through contracts, where your decisions have the power to shape their political landscape. Choose a faction to support or navigate the field strategically for maximum profit.

Assemble a team of colonists

People are your most valuable resource. Keep track of your colonists' health, mood and needs. Hire the best experts and make sure they work as a team: it‚Äôs their unique traits and skills that will allow you to truly optimize your production and research!



Key Features



  • Build a lunar colony
  • Mine and automate resources and production
  • Explore the moon
  • Play through a rich, story driven narrative
  • Trade with Earth
  • Influence politics
  • Manage colonists and their needs




Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

Windows

    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce 1060 or equivalent with 6GB of video RAM
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 8 GB available space

item.title: Bloobs Adventure Idle
item.description:
Title: Bloobs Adventure Idle
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Bloobs_Dev
Publisher: Bloobs_Dev
Release Date: Jul 15, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jul 15, 2024




About This Game

Welcome to Bloobs Adventure Idle !

Embark on a nostalgic journey in this fully idle game!

üöÄ Immerse yourself in a 2D top-down world filled with endless possibilities.

‚öîÔ∏è Engage in Epic Battles: Conquer foes and level up your combat skills as you progress through the game.

üåç Explore Vast Lands: Uncover hidden treasures and secrets as you navigate through the expansive world of Bloobs.

üå≥ Master Gathering Skills: Gather resources to craft powerful items and enhance your character's abilities.

üõ†Ô∏è Become an Artisan: Hone your artisan skills to create unique and valuable items that will set you apart on your adventure.

üìà Full Leveling System: Watch your character evolve and grow stronger with a comprehensive leveling system.

Are you ready to experience the ultimate idle adventure?

Watch on as you command your Bloob to seamlessly navigate his way around a sprawling, ever-expanding world automatically. Choose which skills to train, items to create, and enemies to defeat. Push your and your Bloob's skills farther, and become the most powerful force in the the world. Forge your own path, and your own equipment on your way to conquer every boss that stands in your way. Do it on your time, because after all, Bloob will do the hard work for you.

item.title: Prospector: The First Contract
item.description:
Title: Prospector: The First Contract
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Loonworks Games
Publisher: HypeTrain Digital
Franchise: HypeTrain Digital
Release Date: Jul 12, 2024




About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928080/Prospector/




Welcome to the Prospector: The First Contract - a prequel chapter where you take on your first contract as an Interstellar Prospector. Your main goal is to gather resources on a new planet. Build a living base, use supply routes for exploration, and automate your new home with robots. Once your preparations are complete, you will begin trading with distant colonies for exclusive rewards.





Scout out your surroundings by placing supply lines to provide life support in an oxygen-less environment.





Use collected resources to construct an outpost of your own design.





Craft bots as helpers to automate the logistics of crafting and shipping goods.





Scale your operation and ship more goods to make more credits which will unlock new blueprints for buildings and recipes for crafting.



Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 and above
    • Processor: 1.2Ghz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 512 MB
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Classic Marathon 2
item.description:
Title: Classic Marathon 2
Genre: Action , Free to Play
Developer: Aleph One Developers
Publisher: Aleph One Developers
Release Date: Jul 12, 2024




About This Game

Fresh from your triumph on the colony ship Marathon, you are seized by the rogue AI Durandal to do his bidding in a distant part of the galaxy. Within the ruins of an ancient civilization, you must seek the remnants of a lost clan and uncover their long-buried secrets. Battle opponents ancient and terrible, with sophisticated weapons and devious strategies, all the while struggling to escape the alien nightmare‚Ä¶

This classic 1995 Bungie‚Ñ¢ FPS is now maintained by the fan community. Experience authentic game play using the original data files, with optional widescreen HUD support, 3D filtering/perspective, positional audio, and 60+ fps interpolation, just in case the original is too authentic.

Classic Marathon 2 is powered by the Aleph One engine, which is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL) Version 3.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: The Last Alchemist
item.description:
Title: The Last Alchemist
Genre: Adventure , Simulation
Developer: Vile Monarch
Publisher: Marvelous Europe
Franchise: Marvelous Europe
Release Date: Jul 12, 2024




About This Game



Welcome to the wholesome science-fantasy world of The Last Alchemist, a third-person alchemy simulation game about the blazing pursuit of science and friendship.

Embrace your weird and wonderful role as the world's last Alchemist! You will craft your workshop from the ground up, practice alchemy by solving puzzles, befriend and understand the Agari folk, and roam a vibrant world packed with brilliant resources to bring home and make use of.

SOLVE ALCHEMY PUZZLES
Test, Combine, Transform. Extract Essences from everything you collect, fuse them together and solve Alchemy puzzles to obtain the Properties you need to discover the wonders of this charming world.



CRAFT YOUR WORKSHOP
Find and use various materials to craft your alchemical workshop. You need tools to harvest and research ingredients as well as large machines to perform further experiments. The complexity of known blueprints will increase and soon you will find yourself preparing compound substances or cultivating plants to get necessary ingredients. You can also build furniture for convenience‚Ä¶. and for style.



MEET THE AGARI - YOUR LITTLE MUSHROOM FRIENDS
You share your laboratory with the Agari, a local civilization of sentient mushroom creatures with their own secrets. These cute but cryptic folk run both the economy and the machines you need to optimize production. But you‚Äôll have to work to earn their invaluable trust.



ROAM THE WILDS
Explore colorful and enchanting landscapes rich in resources, secrets, peculiar plants, fungi and minerals. Some of these unique materials need specific alchemical mixtures to be gathered. Find ways to overcome obstacles, unlock new routes and discover wondrous places among the gorgeous, lush peaks of the Alps.



https://store.steampowered.com/app/1536570/The_Last_Alchemist/
